long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkPalette is a Chrome Extension to dynamically style links on webpages, depending on their target domain.

LinkPalette helps to make webpages easier to navigate by letting you choose a individual color for each domain you want to highlight. Make Youtube links more visible by giving them a glaring red or easily find Twitter links by showing them in a bright blue or whatever color you may prefer.

The Choice is yours!

Features:
 - Choose individual colors for different domains. 
 - Display the targets Favicon next to links to quickly know where it will take you.
 - Use Regular Expressions to cover a wide array of pages at once.
 - Blacklist pages you don't want colored using simple domains or Regular 
   Expressions.
